tool_description: API for random image anime with the name.
name: WaifuMe
title: WaifuMe

api_list.name: waifu
api_list.description: Receive one random image with name from endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://waifume.p.rapidapi.com/waifu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "waifume.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://waifume.p.rapidapi.com/waifu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "waifume.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
